Package de.dhbw.course6.javadoc

Class DateTimeHelper

java.lang.Object
de.dhbw.course6.javadoc.DateTimeHelper
public class DateTimeHelper extends Object

This class is a utility class that can be used to handle instances of LocalDateTime.

Whenever this application uses LocalDateTime instances, this utility helps to deal with conversions from and to String. Therefore, It provides specific DateTimeFormatter and conversion methods like format and parse.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_TIMESTAMP_FORMAT

      public static final String DEFAULT_TIMESTAMP_FORMAT
      The default timestamp format according to java.time API: 
        MM.dd.yyyy HH:mm:ss
      See also → DATE_TIME_FORMATTER
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DATE_TIME_FORMATTER

      public static final DateTimeFormatter DATE_TIME_FORMATTER

      The default timestamp formatter according to java.time API. Uses the DEFAULT_TIMESTAMP_FORMAT to format instances of LocalDateTime.

      See also → DEFAULT_TIMESTAMP_FORMAT

      Returns:
      the string formatted with DATE_TIME_FORMATTER
      See Also:
      • DateTimeFormatter

    • format

      public static String format(LocalDateTime localDateTime, String pattern)
      Returns a formatted String which is formatted using the specified format pattern.

      CAUTION The given pattern will be parsed internally and thus have to follow the rules as prescribed by DateTimeFormatter.

      In case of invalid pattern, an exception will be thrown, please visit ← DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(String)
      Parameters:
      localDateTime - the instance of LocalDateTime
      pattern - the pattern to use for formatting
      Returns:
      the formatted string
      See Also:
      • DateTimeFormatter

    • parse

      public static LocalDateTime parse(String localDateTime)
      Parses a string representing the local datetime using the default format pattern as specified in 'DEFAULT_TIMESTAMP_FORMAT'.
      Parameters:
      localDateTime - the String representing the local datetime
      Returns:
      the parsed instance of LocalDateTime

    • parse

      public static LocalDateTime parse(String localDateTime, String pattern)
      Parses a string representing the local datetime using the specified format pattern.
      Parameters:
      localDateTime - the String representing the local datetime
      pattern - the pattern string
      Returns:
      the parsed instance of LocalDateTime
